com.liliya.quiz.playerclient

Interface QuizPlayerClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuizPlayerClientImpl

    public interface QuizPlayerClient
    Public interface for the player client

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDownProgram()
      Shuts down the player client process
      void connectToService()
      Looking up and connecting to the remote service
      void mainMenu()
      Displays menu and launches functionality for the player client
      void playQuiz(int id)
      Takes a quiz id and launches a new quiz game for the player to play Displays the total score achieved for the quiz at the end of the game
      int selectQuizToPlay()
      Retrieves a list of currently available quizzes from the server Displays list to client and accepts player choice
      void viewHighScores()
      Displays the top three scores of the user for all quizzes played so far

    • Method Detail

      • connectToService

        Looking up and connecting to the remote service

      • mainMenu

        void mainMenu()
        Displays menu and launches functionality for the player client

      • selectQuizToPlay

        int selectQuizToPlay()
        Retrieves a list of currently available quizzes from the server Displays list to client and accepts player choice
        Returns:
        the id of the quiz selected by the player;

      • playQuiz

        void playQuiz(int id)
        Takes a quiz id and launches a new quiz game for the player to play Displays the total score achieved for the quiz at the end of the game
        Parameters:
        id - of the quiz

      • viewHighScores

        void viewHighScores()
        Displays the top three scores of the user for all quizzes played so far
